summary:
THE NEW SKSE VERSION IS NOW AVAILABLE HERE :
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26322
This mod allows, through a menu system called by a spell to configure the following features: 
- Configure the lockpicking system.
- Add more unlocking modes.
descriptionHtml:
THE NEW SKSE VERSION IS NOW AVAILABLE HERE :

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26322]Skyrim Enhanced Unlocking[/url]

GBU - Gerauld\'s Better Unlocking
==============================
Version : OLD

English is not my native language (I\'m french).
It\'s the first time I try to release an english version of one of my mod.
If you have suggestions to replace some sentences in the mod, let me know in the 

commentary page.

Description:
============ 
This mod allows, through a menu system called by a spell to configure the following 

features: 
1)The picking system: 

     - Real-time Lockpicking (automatic talent test)
     - Vanilla lockpicking with animation 
     - Vanilla lockpicking

2)additional unlocking modes :

     - Using one handed and two handed weapons
     - Using bows
     - With a vial of acid (available from some dealers)
     - Using a fireball spell
     - Using Ondusi\'s Unhinging spell (available from some dealers)
     - Using the FUS RO DAH shout.

An in-game menu can be called with an alteration spell.

How to install :
================
- Put the then files in the DATA folder of the archive in the DATA folder of Skyrim.
- Activate the mod in the launcher.

How to uninstall :
==================
- Desactivate the mod in the launcher.
- Remove the GBU.esp and GBU.bsa files from your hard drive.

Verion history :
=============
- 1.0 : some fixes with acid flask
- 0.9.3 : some sentences have now a better translation.
- 0.9.2 : non corrupted release of the mod...sorry.

Thanks to Bethesda for the game.

You can check out my next mod there :
http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/viewtopic.php?f=189&t=12270&start=0
The forum is in french but you can use google translate.
I\'ll release an english version too.

I\'ve some mods to translate in order to realease english versions  too.

You can also chek the mods of Sagittarius22, if you want more immersion...
There are both english and french versions.
author: Gerauld
